resources.string: Update failed. Please try again later!
point(s) of interest have been obtained!
No update necessary. The Application is up-to-date!
Your current location will not be shown on the map. Do you want to go to the settings to activate the location services?
No sights found. \nPlease check your settings and use the menu item update to obtain the newest data.
There are currently no sights within reach of
meter. The nearest unvisited attraction is
There are no more unvisited sights. Please reset the database via the settings menu!
was found at a distance of
For all functions to work properly the Location Services have to be active.
For the Nearby View to work properly, the Location Services have to be active. Please enable them and try again.
Current location could not yet be determined. Please activate the usage of GPS and Wireless Networks in the Location Service Settings for higher accuracy.
Automatic Guide has been stopped, press play to resume.
Are you sure you want to exit?
Please wait. Application is initializing the data…
For the initial update an internet connection is required. Do you want to go to WIFI settings?
Press GUIDE to start the automatic guiding mode.\n\nPress MENU or the application icon to open the menu!
This view shows the nearest sights (at most 25). Each one is clickable, if you want to get additional information.\n\nColored entries denote unvisited and gray markers visited sights
This view shows a map with all sights. Each marker is clickable to show the name of the attraction.

Infolevel Normal shows the whole text from Wikipedia, Summary shows the most important 5 sentences of each section and Overview only a short introduction.\n\nNext to the introduction section, there will be only sections which match your chosen categories.
Updates the content data for the application.\n\nINFO: This could take 1–2 minutes and requires an active internet connection.
The Automatic Guider was started. You can now walk through the city, the Guider will inform you, if an interesting sight comes within reach.
No sights found. \nPlease check your settings and use the menu item update to obtain the newest data.
Do you want to go to the settings to activate the location services?
Current location could not yet be determined. Please activate the usage of GPS and Wireless Networks in the Location Service Settings for higher accuracy.
Please choose the categories you want to receive information about:
Using this button you can mark all sights as unvisited.
Are you sure you want to reset the data? All visited POIs will be marked unvisited again.
Please choose the maximum distance for the automatic guider.
Automatic Highlighting of the active sentence:
How many notifications should be received:
Use an own TTS engine (requires restart):
You can update your application manually with this button. An internet connection is required.
Are you sure you want to update the application?
Do you want to go to WIFI settings?
At least one categorie needs to be chosen. \n\nCategories have been reset!
